languages.text: {n}Повисает напряженная пауза. Все слова сказаны. Наконец Немезит тихо произносит:{/n} "Думаю, пора. Прощай, Лорд-капитан". {n}С лица Немезита наконец сползает едкая улыбка, оно становится холодным, собранным и спокойным, словно равнодушная гримаса черепа.{/n}

{n}A tense silence falls, for all the words have been spoken. At last, Nemesite says quietly,{/n} "It's time. Farewell, Lord Captain." {n}The acerbic smile vanishes from his face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Повисает напряженная пауза. Все слова сказаны. Наконец Немезит тихо произносит:{/n} "Думаю, пора. Прощай, Лорд-капитан". {n}С лица Немезита наконец сползает едкая улыбка, оно становится холодным, собранным и спокойным, словно равнодушная гримаса черепа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The acerbic smile vanishes from Nemesite's face, and it becomes cold, collected, and calm like an indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}
{n}The acerbic smile vanishes from Nemesite's face, and it becomes cold, collected, and calm like an indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}
{n}The acerbic smile vanishes from Nemesite's face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}
{n}The acerbic smile vanishes from Nemesite's face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}

{n}A tense silence falls, for all the words have been spoken. At last, Nemesite says quietly,{/n} "It's time. Farewell, Lord Captain." {n}The acerbic smile vanishes from his face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}

{n}A tense silence falls, for all the words have been spoken. At last, Nemesite says quietly,{/n} "It's time. Farewell, Lord Captain." {n}The acerbic smile vanishes from his face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine angespannte Stille entsteht, denn alles ist gesagt. Schließlich fügt Nemesit leise hinzu:{/n} "Es ist so weit. Lebt wohl, Lord Captain!" {n}Das ätzende Lächeln verschwindet aus seinem Gesicht. Stattdessen wird sein Ausdruck kalt, überlegt, ruhig, mit der gleichgültigen Grimasse eines Totenschädels.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence falls, for all the words have been spoken. At last, Nemesite says quietly,{/n} "It's time. Farewell, Lord Captain." {n}The acerbic smile vanishes from his face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine angespannte Stille entsteht, denn alles ist gesagt. Schließlich fügt Nemesit leise hinzu:{/n} "Es ist so weit. Lebt wohl, Lord Captain!" {n}Das ätzende Lächeln verschwindet aus seinem Gesicht. Stattdessen wird sein Ausdruck kalt, überlegt, ruhig, mit der gleichgültigen Grimasse eines Totenschädels.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se hace un silencio tenso, pues ya todo está dicho. Finalmente, Nemesitio dice en voz baja:{/n} «Es la hora. Adiós, Lord Capitán». {n}La sonrisa cruel se desvanece de su rostro. En su lugar, adopta una actitud fría y serena, con la mirada indiferente de una calavera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence falls, for all the words have been spoken. At last, Nemesite says quietly,{/n} "It's time. Farewell, Lord Captain." {n}The acerbic smile vanishes from his face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se hace un silencio tenso, pues ya todo está dicho. Finalmente, Nemesitio dice en voz baja:{/n} «Es la hora. Adiós, Lord Capitán». {n}La sonrisa cruel se desvanece de su rostro. En su lugar, adopta una actitud fría y serena, con la mirada indiferente de una calavera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}緊迫した沈黙が訪れる。ついにネメサイトは静かに口を開いた。{/n}「時間だな。さようなら、ロード・キャプテン」{n}男の顔から辛辣な笑みが消える。代わりに、男の物腰は冷たく冷静で淡々とし、ドクロのように感情のないしかめっ面を浮かべる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence falls, for all the words have been spoken. At last, Nemesite says quietly,{/n} "It's time. Farewell, Lord Captain." {n}The acerbic smile vanishes from his face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}緊迫した沈黙が訪れる。ついにネメサイトは静かに口を開いた。{/n}「時間だな。さようなら、ロード・キャプテン」{n}男の顔から辛辣な笑みが消える。代わりに、男の物腰は冷たく冷静で淡々とし、ドクロのように感情のないしかめっ面を浮かべる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}紧张的沉默降临在你们之间，所有能说的话都说完了。到了最后，涅墨斯特平静地开了口。{/n}“时间到了。永别了，舰长大人。”{n}他脸上尖刻的笑容消失了。他的动作变得冷漠、镇定、宁静，脸上没有任何表情，仿佛白骨一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence falls, for all the words have been spoken. At last, Nemesite says quietly,{/n} "It's time. Farewell, Lord Captain." {n}The acerbic smile vanishes from his face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}紧张的沉默降临在你们之间，所有能说的话都说完了。到了最后，涅墨斯特平静地开了口。{/n}“时间到了。永别了，舰长大人。”{n}他脸上尖刻的笑容消失了。他的动作变得冷漠、镇定、宁静，脸上没有任何表情，仿佛白骨一般。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un silence tendu s'installe après que tout a été dit. Puis, Némésite ajoute à voix basse :{/n} « Il est temps. Adieu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Son sourire acerbe se décompose pour être remplacé par le calme froid et indifférent de la grimace d'un crâne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence falls, for all the words have been spoken. At last, Nemesite says quietly,{/n} "It's time. Farewell, Lord Captain." {n}The acerbic smile vanishes from his face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silence tendu s'installe après que tout a été dit. Puis, Némésite ajoute à voix basse :{/n} « Il est temps. Adieu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Son sourire acerbe se décompose pour être remplacé par le calme froid et indifférent de la grimace d'un crâne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Söylenecek bir söz kalmamasıyla birlikte ortama gergin bir sükûnet çöküyor. En nihayetinde Nemezit, alçak sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Zamanı geldi. Elveda Lord Kaptan." {n}Yüzündeki ekşi gülümseme kayboluyor. Bunun yerine bir kafatasının kayıtsız somurtuşunu andıran, soğuk, aklı başında ve sakin bir tavır takınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tense silence falls, for all the words have been spoken. At last, Nemesite says quietly,{/n} "It's time. Farewell, Lord Captain." {n}The acerbic smile vanishes from his face. Instead, his demeanour turns cold, collected, calm, with the indifferent grimace of a skull.{/n}
